messages.subject: Re: this list...flow...some thoughts
messages.msgSnippet: Pam, I was in attendance at the talk you gave last week.  Thank you again for sharing.  My husband had just finished reading Sandra s Big Book of Unschooling
messages.messageBody:
Pam,

I was in attendance at the talk you gave last week.  Thank you again for sharing.  My husband had just finished reading Sandra's Big Book of Unschooling and we spent that evening discussing how we wanted our family to "be" in the future.  We know we will have bumps in the road but it was wonderful to discuss and be a bit more on the same page.  We will be able to hear Sandra speak at a conference in July and then again in September as well as meeting other families that live and learn together without school so we are looking forward to that. 
We will be looking into joining the HomeSchool Association of CA and attending their conference next year. 

Blessings,
Cindy M.




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
